page.title: 18THE BOWL INN.
page.content:
The present owners of the Bowl Inn have been at the Inn for 5 years.The doors of the Inn are opened at 9:30am, then the owners start work.
Before opening to sell alcohol or other soft drinks,jobs need doing such as ordering, taking and checking deliveries and cleaning.
There are 33{employees}of whom some are part time. The employees live near the inn. 60% of the customers are regulars but the other 40% are passers by or come out from local businesses in the lunch period. Most of the regulars live in the village. The Bowl Inn is supposed to be {haunted,}the door near the main entrance opens and shuts on its own. The Inn closes in the evening at 11 o'clock.
